goal:
European Investors was founded in the summer of 2015, following the observation that a true representative of retail investors was missing in EU policy debates while the need to ensure that retail investors and their interests are properly represented has neven been more apparent.

European Investors promotes, defends and represents the interests of retail and institutional investors in Europe. We act as a powerful and independent spokesperson and aim to contribute to the creation of a sound EU legislative and regulatory framework. In doing so, we strive for adequate legal protection for retail investors and the emergence of a genuine sinlge European financial (services) market based on choice, transparency and competition.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation
